content.content: The end of 2018 is near and triggered by this comment by @pet3rpan   github.com/ethereum-magicians/scrolls      Issue: Application to be an interim github maintainer  	 	opened by pet3r-pan 	on 2018-12-04 	 	 	closed by pet3r-pan 	on 2018-12-11 	  I believe my 24/7 online internet presence along with my burning desire to clean up the issues backlog may potentially be...        I thought it makes sense to think about plans and direction of the Fellowship in 2019. I would really love to see moving away from github and discord to decentralized solutions like pando for dogfooding and decentralisation reasons. What are your ideas for the fellowship in 2019?
content.GPT-summary: The author of the post is asking for feedback and ideas for the Ethereum Magicians Fellowship in 2019. They also explain their proposal to move away from centralized solutions like Github and Discord to decentralized solutions like Pando. A 3rd party could give constructive criticism, collaborate on the proposal, or ask questions about it.
GPT-discussion-categories: Author of proposal is asking for feedback
Author of proposal is explaining proposal
3rd party or author wants to collaborate on proposal

content.content: ligi:  moving away from github and discord to decentralized solutions like pando   is there any suggestions for decentralized googledocs? Creating and maintaining document with tables, cross-links, TOCs is a nightmare in markdown. A decentralized wiki with a good visual editor would be great.
GPT-discussion-categories: 3rd party giving constructive criticism of proposal
None of the topics listed match
